synopsis.text:
If you're looking for an unusual blend of comedy, drama, and a touch of the absurd, meet Ebichu, a devoted and talkative hamster who's more than just a pet. For a mere $10, Ebichu not only becomes your adorable new companion but also a diligent housekeeper who cooks, cleans, and even runs errands. However, her unwavering loyalty and boundless enthusiasm often lead her to meddle in her owner's personal life, resulting in some rather painful consequences.

Ebichu's owner, a 25-year-old office lady, is desperate to find marital bliss but is stuck in a relationship with an unfaithful and underachieving boyfriend. Despite the chaos and heartbreak that often surround her, Ebichu remains steadfast in her mission to bring happiness to her beloved owner, even if it means enduring a few wall collisions along the way.

This anime offers a unique perspective on life, love, and the lengths one tiny hamster will go to for those she cares about. Prepare for a rollercoaster ride of emotions, unexpected laughter, and a hamster's unwavering devotion that will leave you questioning just what you'd expect from your own pet.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
